section.heading: Injunction.
section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of this subchapter, WASA may seek appropriate civil action to secure a temporary restraining order, a preliminary or permanent injunction, or declaratory or other appropriate relief to restrain, minimize, halt, or eliminate the violation of, or attempted violation of, any provision of this subchapter or its implementing rules.

annotations.annotation: D.C. Law 18-256 substituted “WASA may seek” for “the Mayor may authorize”.
